localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Swifter is an AI-based email subject-line generator (using GPT-3). Swifter supports 5 types of email (welcome, abandoned cart, discount, pain-points, goal events) and 3 tones (friendly, bold, professional) and works for both B2B and B2C emails.
blogPost.body: Swifter is an AI-based email subject-line generator (using GPT-3). Swifter supports 5 types of email (welcome, abandoned cart, discount, pain-points, goal events) and 3 tones (friendly, bold, professional) and works for both B2B and B2C emails.
blogPost.title: Swifter - Email subject line generator for B2B & B2C, built with GPT-3
blogPost.author: Sowmya

localize.description: Swifter是一款基于AI的邮件主题行生成器（使用GPT-3）。Swifter支持5种邮件类型（欢迎、放弃购物车、折扣、痛点、目标事件）和3种色调（友好、粗体、专业），适用于B2B和B2C邮件。
localize.tagline: 基于GPT-3的B2B和B2C邮件主题行生成器。

localize.description: Swifter是一款基於AI的郵件主題行生成器（使用GPT-3）。Swifter支持5種郵件類型（歡迎、放棄購物車、折扣、痛點、目標事件）和3種色調（友好、粗體、專業），適用於B2B和B2C郵件。
localize.tagline: 基於GPT-3的B2B和B2C郵件主題行生成器。

next.excerpt: The simplest and most modern data-scraper as a service, as if postman was automated! Focus on developing data-dependant apps without worrying about the data gathering infrastructure. Made for aggregators, bots and data-driven applications.
next.title: Nozomi - Postman, but automated

localize.description: 最简单、最现代的数据搜刮器作为一种服务，仿佛邮递员是自动的! 专注于开发依赖数据的应用程序，而不用担心数据收集基础设施。为聚合器、机器人和数据驱动的应用而生。
最簡單、最現代的數據搜刮器作爲一種服務，彷彿郵遞員是自動的! 專注於開發依賴數據的應用程序，而不用擔心數據收集基礎設施。爲聚合器、機器人和數據驅動的應用而生。
